Entries.default:
"Rise and shine, captain. Looks like we won't have the island to ourselves for much longer." 

Maia nods and brushes you off.

"Awake at last? Captain, another ship landed while you were out. We must prepare for... for anything." 

Swallowing, TekÄ“hu nods and balls his hands into fists.

"I don't mean to rush you, but if you're feeling able, we should hurry. 

"You were out for quite some time. Long enough for our foes to catch up to us here." He nods to the sea beyond the tower while helping you to your feet.
"Good, you're up. Best get your weapons ready, got some old friends stopping by."
"You are awake. Good. The storm has died down, but our enemies have used the opportunity to make their way to Ukaizo."
"Pardon for interrupting your shut-eye, captain, but you've got a whole host of hostile whoresons intent on collecting your head. Mine, too, most like."

"Thank Gaun you're awake. You were starting to worry me.

"We need to be careful. While you were dreaming, some unfavorable types tracked us onto the island."
